About

This is the weblog of Florian Bersier; a PhD student and behavioral economic engineer who researches the formation of reputation and trust in online economies at the university of Oxford, a hacker, a geek, a libertarian and an open source advocate. The idea of this space is to share and discuss excerpts from my code, work, research and play.

Stay in the Know

New posts are announced on the following SNS.

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google+

Let's keep in touch

Email me

For job enquiries, press information, research questions and stuff related to Gmelius or XpressYoo, please send a good ol' email to . FYI, my local time is close to the UTC one () and the current status of my inbox is , implying a minimum delay of hours before any reply.

Follow me

It would be nice to keep in touch, so don't hesitate to add me to your network. The social platforms where I'm the most active are the following ones:
